Welcome to PECUZAL automatic embedding for Python’s documentation!¶

Here we introduce the PECUZAL automatic embedding method blabla

Getting started¶

Go and install that stuff by doing…

Note

This implementation is not profiled well. We recommend to use the implementation in the Julia language, in order to get fast results, especially in the multivariate case. Moreover, it is well documented and embedded in the DynamicalSystems.jl ecosystem.
